name: Emblem of Focused Rage
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of the Agile Huntress
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of the Charging Bull
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of the Leaping Mantis
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of the Riftstalker
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of the Shadowy Assassin
description: "A common symbol of power used by the Witch God cults."(Applied to Medals)

name: Aether Dust
description: "Powder derived from the remains of an Aetherial exposed to concentrated doses of salt."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Arkovian Bonemeal
description: "Crushed bones from the cursed Arkovians, made safe to handle by Rover elders."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Arkovian Rose Powder
description: "Powder derived from a vibrant red flower known to grow only high up in the peaks of Old Arkovia."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Beast Tamer`s Powder
description: "A calming agent used by Homestead farmers to soothe wild animals into submission."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Binding Dust
description: "Dust used by the Order to bind undead beings to their will."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Blacksteel Powder
description: "Secret mix of iron and various minerals known only to the Black Legion."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Blessed Ashes
description: "Ashes from the remains of a fallen member of Kymon`s Chosen."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Boneback Spine
description: "Coarse powder derived from the spines of Boneback rats."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Chillheart Powder
description: "Powder derived from the dead. It appears to readily sap heat from the air around it."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Conjurer`s Powder
description: "Powder used by Rovers in various rituals and meditation sessions. Surprisingly effective during summoning rituals."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Consecrated Silver
description: "Silver consecrated in the divine flame to combat the wretched Chthonians."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Corpsefiend Tentacle
description: "The powder continues to shift within the pouch, as if it were still alive."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Dermapteran Chitin
description: "Powder derived from Dermapteran armor plates, after they go through an extensive acid treatment."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Divine Flame
description: "Powder used by Kymon`s Chosen during ceremonies. When thrown upon a brazier, it erupts in sparking embers. "(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Firebloom Powder
description: "Powder derived from a flower hot to the touch, often found at the base of volcanoes."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Gazer Eye
description: "Powder derived from the crushed eyes of Aetherial Gazers."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Manticore Venom
description: "Powerful toxin extracted from Manticores that burns the skin on contact."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Mortal Coil
description: "Essence of restless spirits, condensed into physical form by forbidden rituals."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Necrotic Flesh
description: "Powder derived from the flesh of the long-deceased, used to power necromantic rituals."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Potent Aether Dust
description: "Powder derived from the remains of an Aetherial exposed to concentrated doses of salt."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Arkovian Bonemeal
description: "Crushed bones from the cursed Arkovians, made safe to handle by Rover elders."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Beast Tamer`s Powder
description: "A calming agent used by Homestead farmers to soothe wild animals into submission."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Blacksteel Powder
description: "Secret mix of iron and various minerals known only to the Black Legion."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Dermapteran Chitin
description: "Powder derived from Dermapteran armor plates, after they go through an extensive acid treatment."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Manticore Venom
description: "Powerful toxin extracted from Manticores that burns the skin on contact."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Raincaller Powder
description: "Folktales speak of a sorcerous powder which, when thrown upon an open flame by the village shaman, will summon rain within a fortnight."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Stonetusk Hoof
description: "Powder derived from the crushed hoof of a Stonetusk boar, a process which involves many blows with a hefty sledge."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Troll Wart Powder
description: "Powder derived from the warts of ancient trolls. Should only be handled with gloves."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Voidbeast Powder
description: "Fine powder derived from the dried remains of Chthonic beasts."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Voidvine Powder
description: "Powder derived from a vine found spreading aggressively throughout the Chthonic Void."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Winterbloom Powder
description: "Powder from a pale blue flower strangely found blooming only during the harsh winter months."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Witch`s Powder
description: "Though technically illegal, the powder has found its use among the Legion`s conjurers."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Raincaller Powder
description: "Folktales speak of a sorcerous powder which, when thrown upon an open flame by the village shaman, will summon rain within a fortnight."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Rifthound Salts
description: "Powder derived from the glowing skin of a rifthound matriarch."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ritual Salts
description: "Salts used in necromantic rituals, often to outline the ritual circle and ward it off from restless spirits."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Rotbloom Powder
description: "Powder derived from a brown-grey flower found growing among carnage and rot."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Slith Venom
description: "Powder extracted from the venomous saliva of Slith matriarchs."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Slithweed Powder
description: "Foul-smelling powder derived from a weed found commonly around swamps and refuse."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Stonetusk Hoof
description: "Powder derived from the crushed hoof of a Stonetusk boar, a process which involves many blows with a hefty sledge."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Storm Powder
description: "A blue powder sparking with raw power from a lightning strike."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Stormtail Viper Venom
description: "Powder that sparks with energy, carefully extracted from the venom of a Stormtail Viper."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Troll Wart Powder
description: "Powder derived from the warts of ancient trolls. Should only be handled with gloves."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Voidbeast Powder
description: "Fine powder derived from the dried remains of Chthonic beasts."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Voidvine Powder
description: "Powder derived from a vine found spreading aggressively throughout the Chthonic Void."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Winterbloom Powder
description: "Powder from a pale blue flower strangely found blooming only during the harsh winter months."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Witch`s Powder
description: "Though technically illegal, the powder has found its use among the Legion`s conjurers."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Blazecore Powder
description: "Powder extracted from the blazing hearts of fiery beasts."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Blight Beast Pustules
description: "Though necromancy is seldom used among the Coven, it has its uses. The pus from blight beasts in particular has arcane properties if extracted properly."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Bloodrose Thorn
description: "So named for its incredibly sharp thorns and vibrant red color, the bloodrose thorn makes a potent hemorrhaging poison when concentrated."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Bloodscale Powder
description: "Powder derived from the scales of the Bloodscale Slith sometimes seen roaming parts of Ugdenbog."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Cinderbark Powder
description: "Cinders from the trees incinerated by a forgotten god`s wrath."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Colossus Spine
description: "Aetherial colossi are nothing to be trifled with, but even bringing one down provides enough material to create several month`s supply."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Desert Tongue
description: "Powder derived from a vibrant red plant found growing within the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Duskbloom
description: "The powdered petals of a potent plant found growing near now seldom seen pools of water within the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Eldritch Bloom Powder
description: "Powder derived from a rare plant found only within the Korvan Plateau, its biology seems to be unlike any other fauna in the region."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Fleshwarp Powder
description: "This enchanting powder must be carefully handled such that it never touches human flesh, but acquiring the materials from Aetherial corruptions is perhaps the most difficult part."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Gargoyle Fang
description: "Fang from a mythical eldritch creature rarely seen outside of the Eldritch Realm."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Gargoyle Scale
description: "Teeming with eldritch energies and nearly impossible to turn to powder without arcane tools."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Gryphon Talon
description: "Powder derived from the talons of gryphons inhabiting the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Haunted Powder
description: "Powder left behind by the ghostly apparitions sometimes seen around Ugdenbog."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Hexxer`s Bloom
description: "This plant appears to be new to Cairn, likely having traveled through the weakening barrier between realities as the rifthounds and other beasts had, but its arcane properties quickly earned it a place in the Coven`s stockpiles."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Hexxer`s Delight
description: "Powder derived from a rare mushroom growing in Ugdenbog. It is considered a delicacy by the common folk, and a powerful ingredient by the Coven."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Hexxer`s Kiss
description: "A potent powder used by the Coven to dispose of particularly undesirable pests."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Imp Eye Powder
description: "Powder extracted from the bloated eyes of Aetherial imps."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Keeper`s Essence
description: "Arcane essence from the various guardians roaming the temples of the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Korvan Cactus Powder
description: "Korvan cacti greedily retain precious water in the Korvan Plateau, and absorb the eldritch energies that teem within."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Korvan Sunpowder
description: "Crystals infused with the scorching sun of the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Machinist Powder
description: "Made famous by Malmouth`s once booming industry, the enchanting powder strengthens metal to withstand even greater punishment."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Magecap Powder
description: "Magecaps thrive in the damp earth of Ugdenbog, providing the Coven both with sustenance and materials for their craft."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Mender`s Powder
description: "Concocted by the survivors of Malmouth to quickly mend wounds on the fields of battle."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Nightsteel Polish
description: "A Malmouth specialty, highly coveted by the nightblades of Erulan."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Potent Blight Beast Pustules
description: "Though necromancy is seldom used among the Coven, it has its uses. The pus from blight beasts in particular has arcane properties if extracted properly."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Bloodscale Powder
description: "Powder derived from the scales of the Bloodscale Slith sometimes seen roaming parts of Ugdenbog."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Duskbloom
description: "The powdered petals of a potent plant found growing near now seldom seen pools of water within the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Eldritch Bloom Powder
description: "Powder derived from a rare plant found only within the Korvan Plateau, its biology seems to be unlike any other fauna in the region."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Gargoyle Scale
description: "Teeming with eldritch energies and nearly impossible to turn to powder without arcane tools."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Gryphon Talon
description: "Powder derived from the talons of gryphons inhabiting the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Haunted Powder
description: "Powder left behind by the ghostly apparitions sometimes seen around Ugdenbog."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Hexxer`s Kiss
description: "A potent powder used by the Coven to dispose of particularly undesirable pests."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Imp Eye Powder
description: "Powder extracted from the bloated eyes of Aetherial imps."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Korvan Cactus Powder
description: "Korvan cacti greedily retain precious water in the Korvan Plateau, and absorb the eldritch energies that teem within."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Korvan Sunpowder
description: "Crystals infused with the scorching sun of the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Machinist Powder
description: "Made famous by Malmouth`s once booming industry, the enchanting powder strengthens metal to withstand even greater punishment."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Sandclaw Fang
description: "A fang finely ground into enchanting powder, gathered from the sandclaws roaming the Korvan dunes."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Scarabshell Powder
description: "The shells of the Korvan scarabs make for fine enchanting powder, if you can actually manage to crush them."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Sparkbloom Powder
description: "Powder from a vibrant flower found growing in the outskirts of Malmouth, known for its fire-tinted petals."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Spikeshell Powder
description: "Powder derived from the hard carapace of Ugdenbog spikeshell. It takes many hours and great strength to crush the shell into such a fine material."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Stardust
description: "Dust from a passing star, carefully collected so that its arcane properties would not wane."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Viper Venom
description: "Venom from the Korvan viper, carefully extracted and stored in an enchanted pouch so as not to dissolve the container."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Void Tar
description: "Though difficult to work with and highly unstable, Malmouth`s arcanists had discovered a use for this dense material in their enchantments."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Wendigo Fur
description: "Powder derived from tufts of wendigo fur, gift from the Ravager."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Whipvine Powder
description: "Whipvine is difficult to harvest, and sometimes deadly, but its many uses for both medicine and magic make it worth the effort."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Rotflesh Powder
description: "The creator insisted that it is simply powdered flesh from the bloated human corpses floating about Ugdenbog. Nobody really wants to know for certain."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Rotvine Powder
description: "The stench coming from the powder is merely a sampling of the grotesque scents emitted by the actual plant."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Sagethorn Powder
description: "The sagethorn is considered invaluable among scholars for its dark red ink, but those harvesting it must take care around the thorny exterior lest they suffer lesions that never truly heal."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Sandclaw Fang
description: "A fang finely ground into enchanting powder, gathered from the sandclaws roaming the Korvan dunes."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Sandclaw Scale
description: "When sandclaw matriarchs molt, some of their scales have absorbed more of the ambient eldritch energies in the region than others. Those make for the most potent enchantments."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Scarabshell Powder
description: "The shells of the Korvan scarabs make for fine enchanting powder, if you can actually manage to crush them."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Scorpius Venom
description: "Venom from the tail glands of the deadly creatures roaming the desert sands."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Soulwarp Powder
description: "The essence of a wraithlike spirit bound into bonemeal for enchanting purposes."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Sparkbloom Powder
description: "Powder from a vibrant flower found growing in the outskirts of Malmouth, known for its fire-tinted petals."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Spikeshell Powder
description: "Powder derived from the hard carapace of Ugdenbog spikeshell. It takes many hours and great strength to crush the shell into such a fine material."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Stardust
description: "Dust from a passing star, carefully collected so that its arcane properties would not wane."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Veilworm Powder
description: "Powder derived from disturbing manifestations of the void that seemingly feed on the barrier between realities."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Viper Scale
description: "Scales collected from the Korvan vipers, almost as challenging to gather as their venomous fangs."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Viper Venom
description: "Venom from the Korvan viper, carefully extracted and stored in an enchanted pouch so as not to dissolve the container."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Void Ash
description: "Ashes from the Chthonian realm, sometimes found on the bodies of slain Chthonians. You would not find anyone foolish enough to actually enter a Chthonian rift."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Void Salt
description: "Enchanting powder derived from the ashes within the Void itself. You sense a hint of human souls within the mix, but can`t be sure if that`s an addition, or another unpleasant aspect of the void."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Void Tar
description: "Though difficult to work with and highly unstable, Malmouth`s arcanists had discovered a use for this dense material in their enchantments."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Void Tongue
description: "Powdered tongue from a Chthonian fiend."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Wendigo Fur
description: "Powder derived from tufts of wendigo fur, gift from the Ravager."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Whipvine Powder
description: "Whipvine is difficult to harvest, and sometimes deadly, but its many uses for both medicine and magic make it worth the effort."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Aetherstorm Powder
description: "Black Legion mages believe that the best way to combat the enemy is to use their power against them. This powder is a rare example where such experiments were sanctioned."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Beastlord`s Calling
description: "A concoction used by the people of Homestead to bless their herds."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Breath of Life
description: "The spirit of spring, rebirth, a breath of new life."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Cairn`s Hope
description: "Even as they prepare their defenses, the survivors speak fondly of a time when the world will be free of the invaders."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Creed`s Cunning
description: "The inquisitor`s powder, given only to his most trusted allies, sparks with arcane energy."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Empyrion`s Touch
description: "Sparking powder believed to have been touched by the Lightbringer himself."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Essence of Ch`thon
description: "Weapons coated with the entrails of Chthonian beings often become warped and unrecognizable, but in doing so capture the essence of the void itself."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Infernal Dust
description: "Sorcerous powder burning with the wrath of Empyrion."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Keeper`s Binding Dust
description: "Binding Dust created by the Keeper herself to bind the most powerful of undead servants."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Kymon`s Fury
description: "Those that have seen Kymon in battle say that he fights with the vengeful fury of the gods themselves."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Kymon`s Vision
description: "Kymon`s vision for Cairn`s future drives his Chosen into a frenzy when they engage with the enemies of Cairn."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Kymon`s Will
description: "Kymon, chosen by the gods, bestows some of his divine status upon the worthy and willing."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Malkadarr`s Chillbane
description: "Sorcerous powder created by Malkadarr, First of the Inner Circle."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Menhir`s Blessing
description: "It is said that earth blessed by the deity Menhir brings the most plentiful harvest. When applied correctly, this blessing can be extended to tools, homes and even weapons."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Mogdrogen`s Blessing
description: "Powder allegedly blessed by the beast god himself to strengthen the bond between man and beast."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Mogdrogen`s Sanctity
description: "Legends speak of a time when Mogdrogen, the beast god, made a pact with Rhowan that no animal shall harm him or his people for as long as they never lift a blade. Unfortunately aether-afflicted animals do not seem to share this sentiment."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Nature`s Harvest
description: "Some farmers pray for a healthy harvest. Those more magically inclined know how to cheat the odds. When adapted to weapons, this wild growth can prove disastrous to flesh."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Nature`s Wrath
description: "Potent mix of poisons and toxins known only to the Rovers and used only under dire circumstances."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Oleron`s Fervor
description: "Some Black Legion troops shout the war god`s name as they charge into battle. This enchantment, given only to officers, was named in honor of the legion`s patron deity."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Bastion
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow skin of iron upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Deathtouch
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over life`s essence upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Frostbite
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over ice upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Inferno
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery of hellfire upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Might
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow the strength of ten men upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Riftstorm
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over the chaotic void upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Thunder
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery of the skies upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Venom
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over poisons upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Outcast`s Wrath
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over the aether upon the user."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Overseer`s Gaze
description: "Kasparov, his attention ever consumed by his experiments, accidentally stumbled upon a use for the eyes of Aetherial Overseers when he tried to turn one into an explosive."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Potent Aetherstorm Powder
description: "Black Legion mages believe that the best way to combat the enemy is to use their power against them. This powder is a rare example where such experiments were sanctioned."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Beastlord`s Calling
description: "A concoction used by the people of Homestead to bless their herds."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Creed`s Cunning
description: "The inquisitor`s powder, given only to his most trusted allies, sparks with arcane energy."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Essence of Ch`thon
description: "Weapons coated with the entrails of Chthonian beings often become warped and unrecognizable, but in doing so capture the essence of the void itself."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Menhir`s Blessing
description: "It is said that earth blessed by the deity Menhir brings the most plentiful harvest. When applied correctly, this blessing can be extended to tools, homes and even weapons."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Nature`s Harvest
description: "Some farmers pray for a healthy harvest. Those more magically inclined know how to cheat the odds. When adapted to weapons, this wild growth can prove disastrous to flesh."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Oleron`s Fervor
description: "Some Black Legion troops shout the war god`s name as they charge into battle. This enchantment, given only to officers, was named in honor of the legion`s patron deity."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Bastion
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow skin of iron upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Deathtouch
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over life`s essence upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Frostbite
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over ice upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Inferno
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery of hellfire upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Might
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow the strength of ten men upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Riftstorm
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over the chaotic void upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Thunder
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery of the skies upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Venom
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over poisons upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Outcast`s Wrath
description: "Supreme enchantment devised by the Outcast to bestow mastery over the aether upon the user."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Solar Radiance
description: "The power of the sun, trapped in sorcerous powder."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Ulgrim`s Guile
description: "Nobody knows for sure what the First Blade of the Emperor combines to create this sorcerous powder, but none can question the results."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Rhowan`s Resolve
description: "Rhowan, the last king of Arkovia and founder of the Rhowari, was said to have abandoned all his kingly possessions when he set out upon the road. His conviction and resolve through difficult times represent everything that all Rovers strive towards."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Rhowan`s Wisdom
description: "Rhowan, the last king of Arkovia and founder of the Rhowari, represents wisdom among the Rovers. This enchantment was named in his honor."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Solar Radiance
description: "The power of the sun, trapped in sorcerous powder."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Song of the Elements
description: "Sahdina, the spirit guide, has devised this enchantment to contain the conflicting forces of fire and ice."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Spirit of Vengeance
description: "Captured form of a vile and vengeful spirit from the Arkovian ruins. The inside of the crucible is etched with protective runes."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Survivor`s Ally
description: "When allies are few, an animal companion can prove to be the only true friend."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Survivor`s Ingenuity
description: "With supplies limited, the people of Devil`s Crossing have devised clever solutions to deal with seemingly any threat, and that includes enchantments."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Survivor`s Perseverance
description: "With the powers of chaos and the aether on their doorstep, the survivors have adapted to these new threats."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Survivor`s Resilience
description: "When times seem most grim, the human will to survive is at its greatest."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Traveler`s Boon
description: "Rovers setting out on particularly lengthy journeys will have the elders prepare this enchantment to protect them on the long road."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ulgrim`s Guile
description: "Nobody knows for sure what the First Blade of the Emperor combines to create this sorcerous powder, but none can question the results."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Uroboruuk`s Anguish
description: "The master Uroboruuk endured unspeakable anguish at the hands of the Arkovians. This horrid enchantment seeks to replicate his suffering."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Uroboruuk`s Path
description: "To follow Uroboruuk`s path is to seek the path of knowledge, wherever it may lead."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Uroboruuk`s Word
description: "During the first of many lessons, the master Uroboruuk would utter just a single word as he held his arms over a corpse: Rise."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Viloth`s Bite
description: "The legendary slith matriarch, Viloth, produces a bile of extraordinary toxicity. Barnabas discovered a way to process it into a powder, which he now offers to those willing to fight for Devil`s Crossing."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Winter`s Chill
description: "The essence of winter`s chill, a terrible force of change and cleansing for the world, mark of a new beginning."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Arcane Heart Powder
description: "An unstable sorcerous powder that burns so hot it can even damage armor, but its potency makes the risks worth it for many arcane practitioners."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Arcanum Dust
description: "Specially derived for the Gildam Arcanum, this enchantment serves to empower the arcane capabilities of the user."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ateph`s Command
description: "A potent enchanting powder derived from the relics found within the Temple of Ateph that grants the wielder a taste for blood."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ateph`s Glare
description: "A potent enchanting powder derived from the relics found within the Temple of Ateph which infuses equipment with a chilling touch."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ateph`s Promise
description: "A potent enchanting powder derived from the relics found within the Temple of Ateph that shields the wielder from harm."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Ateph`s Will
description: "A potent enchanting powder derived from the relics found within the Temple of Ateph, intended to bolster the bond between master and minion."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Basilisk`s Bite
description: "A powerful toxin extracted from the venom glands of Ugdenbog basilisks."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Basilisk`s Gaze
description: "A powerful toxin extracted from the petrifying eyes of Ugdenbog basilisks."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Bysmiel`s Control
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, perfectly attuned to the minds of minions."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Bysmiel`s Cunning
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel to give her servants an edge in physical combat, when retreating into the shadows is not an option."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Bysmiel`s Shroud
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, attuned to the veil that divides the living from the dead."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Coven`s Bane
description: "A vile toxin derived from various plants in Ugdenbog, combined with Coven magic to maximize its efficacy."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Coven`s Guile
description: "A special enchanting powder crafted by the Coven to sharpen the senses."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Coven`s Terror
description: "A special poison imbued by Coven hexes to overwhelm the minds of their foes with terrifying visions."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Coven`s Wit
description: "A special enchanting powder crafted by the Coven to empower their dark arts."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Dreeg`s Foresight
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg that bestows upon the bearer a mere taste of the Great Guardian`s vision for Cairn."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Dreeg`s Spinedust
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg derived from one of the Great Guardian`s spines, ever dripping with acid."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Dreeg`s Terror
description: "A gift, or perhaps a curse, from the witch god Dreeg that grants the bearer a fragment of a possible future where the void reigns supreme over all creation."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Forgefire
description: "A favorite of Malmouth smiths, this powder is often used in forges to make the flames burn hotter, but serves equally well as an enchantment."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Hammerfall Powder
description: "Powder gathered from the cinder remnants of arcane forged steel."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Heart of Ugdenbog
description: "A potent enchantment crafted from the stone hearts of Ugdenbog`s mightiest golems."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Irrah`s Blood
description: "A fine enchanting powder derived from the ashes of the pyres within Irrah`s temple, said to be infused with celestial blood."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Irrah`s Patience
description: "A fine enchanting powder derived from the ashes of the pyres within Irrah`s temple that fills the bearer with an unnatural calm."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Irrah`s Soulfire
description: "A fine enchanting powder derived from the ashes of the pyres within Irrah`s temple, still infused with soul fragments of sacrificial victims."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Irrah`s Venomtongue
description: "A fine enchanting powder derived from the ashes of the pyres within Irrah`s temple, infused with various toxins found among the flora and fauna of the Korvan Plateau."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Malmouth`s Heart
description: "A surprisingly potent powder created out of desperation during the initial assault on Malmouth. Though it borrows from the Aether and may ultimately prove to be mankind`s undoing, for now it serves a valuable purpose."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Malmouth`s Redemption
description: "A potent enchantment crafted by the survivors of Malmouth to defend themselves from the Aetherials."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Malmouth`s Soul
description: "An empowering powder instilled with the iron will of the people."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Malmouth`s Will
description: "A potent enchantment created by Malmouth`s smiths to strengthen their swing, but it serves equally well in battle."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Osyr`s Fortitude
description: "A dense enchanting powder derived from the desiccated remains of Osyr`s priesthood, still blessed by the lost god`s word."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Osyr`s Guidance
description: "A dense enchanting powder derived from the desiccated remains of Osyr`s priesthood, attuned to the mastery of conjured creatures."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Osyr`s Temper
description: "A dense enchanting powder derived from the desiccated remains of Osyr`s priesthood, tainted by a darkness without name."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Osyr`s Wisdom
description: "A dense enchanting powder derived from the desiccated remains of Osyr`s priesthood, still teeming with raw arcane energies."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Potent Bysmiel`s Control
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, perfectly attuned to the minds of minions."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Bysmiel`s Cunning
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel to give her servants an edge in physical combat, when retreating into the shadows is not an option."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Bysmiel`s Shroud
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, attuned to the veil that divides the living from the dead."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Coven`s Bane
description: "A vile toxin derived from various plants in Ugdenbog, combined with Coven magic to maximize its efficacy."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Coven`s Guile
description: "A special enchanting powder crafted by the Coven to sharpen the senses."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Coven`s Terror
description: "A special poison imbued by Coven hexes to overwhelm the minds of their foes with terrifying visions."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Coven`s Wit
description: "A special enchanting powder crafted by the Coven to empower their dark arts."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Dreeg`s Foresight
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg that bestows upon the bearer a mere taste of the Great Guardian`s vision for Cairn."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Dreeg`s Spinedust
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg derived from one of the Great Guardian`s spines, ever dripping with acid."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Dreeg`s Terror
description: "A gift, or perhaps a curse, from the witch god Dreeg that grants the bearer a fragment of a possible future where the void reigns supreme over all creation."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Malmouth`s Heart
description: "A surprisingly potent powder created out of desperation during the initial assault on Malmouth. Though it borrows from the Aether and may ultimately prove to be mankind`s undoing, for now it serves a valuable purpose."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Malmouth`s Redemption
description: "A potent enchantment crafted by the survivors of Malmouth to defend themselves from the Aetherials."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Malmouth`s Soul
description: "An empowering powder instilled with the iron will of the people."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Malmouth`s Will
description: "A potent enchantment created by Malmouth`s smiths to strengthen their swing, but it serves equally well in battle."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Ravager`s Breath
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. Its touch inflicts grievous wounds and blisters upon flesh."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Ravager`s Eye
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It inspires unmatched loyalty."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Ravager`s Harvest
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It instills an insatiable hunger."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Ravager`s Rage
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It evokes uncontrollable rage."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Solael`s Glare
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, infused with the essence of the Eldritch Flame`s will."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Solael`s Vision
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, promising untold destruction upon his enemies."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Potent Solael`s Voracity
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, granting the bearer a taste of the Eldritch Flame`s endless hunger."(Applied to all two-handed weapons)

name: Ravager`s Breath
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. Its touch inflicts grievous wounds and blisters upon flesh."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Ravager`s Eye
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It inspires unmatched loyalty."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Ravager`s Harvest
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It instills an insatiable hunger."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Ravager`s Rage
description: "A gift bestowed by the Ravager upon his cursed worshippers. It evokes uncontrollable rage."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Rotgut Venom
description: "A deadly poison crafted by the nightblades, many of the necessary materials are only available from Malmouth."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Skyshard Powder
description: "Originally created by the Arcanist Master Trozan, the Coven has made great use of the arcane potential of sky borne objects."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Solael`s Glare
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, infused with the essence of the Eldritch Flame`s will."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Solael`s Vision
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, promising untold destruction upon his enemies."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Solael`s Voracity
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, granting the bearer a taste of the Eldritch Flame`s endless hunger."(Applied to all one-handed weapons, shields and caster off-hands)

name: Steelbloom Powder
description: "An enchanting powder derived from the unusual Steelbloom, a flower found to have large quantities of metallic particles in its stem that it draws from the earth through a deep root structure."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Sylvarria`s Essence
description: "Legends speak of a mythical entity growing within Ugdenbog whose roots span the entirety of the swamp. So named after this creature, the enchantment derives its properties from many plants in the region."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Typhoon Powder
description: "The power of a devastating typhoon, trapped in a sorcerous powder."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Witch`s Black Flame
description: "Often associated with rituals performed by the cults of the three Witch Gods, the Coven often makes use of this vile powder when a ritual calls for it."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Wraith`s Scream
description: "Through a terrifying binding ritual, a Coven hexxer is capable of trapping and disintegrating an Ugdenbog wraith."(Applied to rings and amulets)

name: Emblem of Dreeg`s Vector
description: "A formidable symbol of power found across the far reaches of Cairn."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of Korvan Swiftness
description: "A formidable symbol of power found across the far reaches of Cairn."(Applied to Medals)

name: Emblem of Rahn`s Might
description: "A formidable symbol of power found across the far reaches of Cairn."(Applied to Medals)

description: "A formidable symbol of power found across the far reaches of Cairn."(Applied to Medals)

name: Bladeward Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder devised by Sahdina to protect the defenders of Devil`s Crossing from physical altercations."(Applied to all armor)

name: Demonbane Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder created by Chosen priests to protect their allies against the vile denizens of the Chthonic Void."(Applied to all armor)

name: Flameweave Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder derived from the sun-bleached bones of Manticores, often used to strengthen armor against flame."(Applied to all armor)

name: Kingsguard Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder aptly named for its use on the wardrobes of royalty, but it finds equal value in combat."(Applied to all armor)

name: Kymon`s Blessing
description: "Sorcerous powder blessed by Father Kymon to ward his followers against the scorching flames of Empyrion."(Applied to all armor)

name: Kymon`s Conduit
description: "Sorcerous powder created by Father Kymon to channel lightning away from the wearer`s heart."(Applied to all armor)

name: Mankind`s Vigil
description: "Sorcerous powder crafted by the Legion`s arcanists to ward their soldiers against the invading forces of the Aetherials and the Chthonians."(Applied to all armor)

name: Mogdrogen`s Touch
description: "A blessing from the beast god to protect his followers from the ravages of nature."(Applied to all armor)

name: Nightshade Powder
description: "Powder derived from the blue petals of the Asterkarn Nightshade, a flower that only blossoms in the light of the moon."(Applied to all armor)

name: Outcast`s Elemental Scales
description: "The Outcast`s specially crafted powder wards the user against the contrasting forces of fire and ice."(Applied to all armor)

name: Outcast`s Skyguard Powder
description: "The Outcast`s specially crafted powder wards the user against sky-powered sorcery."(Applied to all armor)

name: Outcast`s Warding Powder
description: "The Outcast`s exceptional mastery over the arcane allows her to create powders that can ward even the dimmest man against the destructive forces of the Aether."(Applied to all armor)

name: Solarstorm Powder
description: "This specially crafted powder can only be mixed during a solar eclipse, lest it loses its arcane properties and becomes no more than ash."(Applied to all armor)

name: Spellward Powder
description: "Experienced arcanists within the ranks of the Order have crafted this powder to protect their allies from arcane rituals."(Applied to all armor)

name: Spiritguard Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder derived from the ashes of a fallen necromancer."(Applied to all armor)

name: Venomguard Powder
description: "A Rover powder derived from several deadly toxins originating from both beast and plant."(Applied to all armor)

name: Wraithtouch Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder infused with the essence of a captured wraith."(Applied to all armor)

name: Bysmiel`s Desert Barb
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, the Schemer`s deadly kiss infused within the enchanting powder."(Applied to all armor)

name: Bysmiel`s Silversand
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, an incredibly fine silver powder often used in illusions, but also handy for protective wards."(Applied to all armor)

name: Bysmiel`s Veiltouch
description: "A gift from the witch god Bysmiel, a powder magically linked to the very veil that divides the living and the dead."(Applied to all armor)

name: Coven Black Ash
description: "Ashes infused by the Coven with the blood of Chthonians."(Applied to all armor)

name: Coven Bloodied Ash
description: "Ashes infused by the Coven with the blood of Wendigos."(Applied to all armor)

name: Coven Warding Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder crafted by the Coven to protect them during rituals."(Applied to all armor)

name: Dreeg`s Fiendblood
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg, derived from the chthonic fiends the Great Guardian has crushed at the gates of the Eldritch Realm."(Applied to all armor)

name: Dreeg`s Omen
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg that offers the bearer brief flashes of the future."(Applied to all armor)

name: Dreeg`s Veilward
description: "A gift from the witch god Dreeg intended to shield the mind from the mind-altering visions imparted by the Great Guardian upon his followers."(Applied to all armor)

name: Malmouth Fortifying Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder used to renew strength even after hours of exhausting combat."(Applied to all armor)

name: Malmouth Soulguard Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder crafted in Malmouth to protect the survivors from Aetherial possession. Nobody`s been bold enough to test its effectiveness though."(Applied to all armor)

name: Malmouth Woundsear Powder
description: "Sorcerous powder often used to singe wounds in an emergency. A painful process, but still more desirable than bleeding out."(Applied to all armor)

name: Solael`s Bloodbinding
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, a foul powder used in rituals that bind the recipients to Solael`s covenant."(Applied to all armor)

name: Solael`s Soulbinding
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael, a vile powder used in spirit-binding rituals for the Eldritch Flame to devour."(Applied to all armor)

name: Solael`s Voidward
description: "A gift from the witch god Solael intended to shield the mind from the ravages of the void so that the Eldritch Flame may study its secrets unhindered."(Applied to all armor)

name: Wendigo Bloodscent Powder
description: "A gift from the Ravager to stifle blood loss and make the user more difficult to track."(Applied to all armor)

name: Wendigo Lifescent Powder
description: "A gift from the Ravager to strengthen the mortal coil."(Applied to all armor)

name: Wendigo Soulscent Powder
description: "A gift from the Ravager to ward the soul against wraiths."(Applied to all armor)

name: Rune of Amatok`s Breath
description: "An ancient symbol of power thought lost to a shattered reality."(Applied to Medals)

name: Rune of Astral Rifts
description: "An ancient symbol of power thought lost to a shattered reality."(Applied to Medals)

name: Rune of Blazing Ends
description: "An ancient symbol of power thought lost to a shattered reality."(Applied to Medals)
